question: What is the translation: System.out.println("BlitzCode rules!");
What is the translation: System.out.println("Hello, World!");
What is the translation: System.out.printf("The value of x is %d", x);
answer: print("The value of x is", x)
wrongAnswers: System.out.printf("The value of x is %d", x)
println("The value of x is", x)
printf("The value of x is %d", x);

question: What is the translation: System.out.printf("The value of pi is %.2f", Math.PI);
answer: print("The value of pi is", format(math.pi, '.2f'))
wrongAnswers: System.out.printf("The value of pi is %.2f", Math.PI)
print("The value of pi is", format(Math.PI, '.2f'))
console.log("The value of pi is", Math.PI);

question: What is the translation: System.out.printf("%s is %d years old", name, age);
wrongAnswers: System.out.printf("%s is %d years old", name, age)
console.log("%s is %d years old", name, age);
print("%s is %d years old" % name, age)
